titleStmt.title: Natures picture drawn by fancies pencil to the life being several feigned stories, comical, tragical, tragi-comical, poetical, romanicical, philosophical, historical, and moral : some in verse, some in prose, some mixt, and some by dialogues / written by ... the Duchess of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
